programme.title: The Stick Up Kids
programme.desc: Santos (Tariq Alexander) and his friends become hustlers to earn money on the streets in Harlem and eventually use their skills to help stop a project from ruining their stomping grounds.

programme.title: The Suspect
programme.desc: Two black American social scientists pose as bank robbers to study racial dynamics in small-town law enforcement.

programme.title: The Pact
programme.desc: Disturbing visions and her sister's disappearance lead a woman (Caity Lotz) to call a cop (Casper Van Dien) and a psychic to her childhood home.

programme.title: Beneath the Darkness
programme.desc: Teenagers discover a terrible secret when they break into the home of a mortician (Dennis Quaid) whose wife died two years earlier.
When Earth's air becomes unbreathable, a message from the future sends a man on a dangerous mission to an unknown world to save the human race.

programme.title: Exorcismus
programme.desc: Believing she's possessed by the devil, 15-year-old Emma Evans turns to her cleric uncle to perform an exorcism.

programme.title: State of Emergency
programme.desc: Survivors band together after an explosion at a military bio-weapons plant turns most of their neighbors into flesh-eating zombies.

programme.title: Blood Glacier
programme.desc: Scientists discover that a red liquid leaking from a nearby glacier contains organisms that turn living hosts into deadly mutants.

programme.title: The Hallow
programme.desc: A family is forced to fight demonic creatures for survival after they move into a remote millhouse in Ireland.

programme.title: Antiviral
programme.desc: Syd has to unravel the mystery surrounding Hannah's death before a virus kills him.

programme.title: Almost Human
programme.desc: Seth sees his best friend disappear in a flash of light. Two years later, Seth is still dealing with the fallout and suspicions when a series of grisly murders rocks the community.

programme.title: The Pack
programme.desc: A farmer and his family have to fight for survival when a pack of wild dogs break into their home.

programme.title: Blood, Sweat and Terrors
programme.desc: Nine blood-soaked tales of action and horror.
